mapper.select: select distinct CONCAT('地下水位监测(',t.sensor_id,')点') from out_wl t order by t.sensor_id;
select distinct t.sensor_id from out_wl t order by t.sensor_id;
select t.value from out_wl t where t.sensor_id=#{sensorId}
SELECT distinct DATE_FORMAT(t.datetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H') FROM out_wl t

select distinct date_format(t.datetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H') from out_wl t where date_format(t.datetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H') not in (select date_format(t.datetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H') from out_wl t where t.sensor_id=#{0} );
select distinct date_format(t.datetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H') from out_wl t where t.sensor_id=#{0} order by t.datetime
select t.value from out_wl t where t.sensor_id=#{0} and date_format(t.datetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H') = date_format(#{1},'%Y-%m-%d %H');

select t.value from out_wl t where t.sensor_id=#{0} and unix_timestamp(t.datetime) > unix_timestamp(DATE_FORMAT(#{1},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) and unix_timestamp(t.datetime) < unix_timestamp(DATE_FORMAT(#{2},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'));
